ovdesc.p: This file contains the Errors/Overrides and its response codes which has to be triggered, when a transaction is not successful.

desc.p: Description for the table, free field.
Contains the Overrides/Errors that occurs in T24
Contains the specific response code for the
Response code to be sent if a transaction is Successful
Default response code to be sent if a transaction gets failed
For future use for local references.
